title: IS_TARGET_FIELD_ASSIGNED
description: Returns TRUE if the mapped target field has been processed and assigned a value. Returns FALSE if the field was skipped ($SKIP_ASSIGNMENT) or has not been processed.

parameters.name: mapped_target_field_name
parameters.description: The API name of the mapped target field to check for assignment status.

examples:
IS_TARGET_FIELD_ASSIGNED("Priority")
-- Returns TRUE if Priority was assigned a value; returns FALSE if it was skipped or unprocessed.
